sourcesContent:
The Document Title and Document URL are required fields
Keep HTML:

Welcome

Welcome to my home.

The DIV element will be removed when the checkbox is not checked.

The DIV element will return, if you check the checkbox.

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, FormArray, Validators, NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-document-edit', templateUrl: './document-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-edit.component.css'] }) export class DocumentEditComponent implements OnInit { originalDocument: Document; document: Document; editMode: boolean = false; //tsdocTitle = {"docTitle": ""} //tsdocDesc = {"docDesc": "Whatever Description"} //tsdocUrl = {"docUrl": ""} tsWhat = false; // tsdocUrl = {"docUrl": ""} ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit(f: NgForm) { // console.log(f) // console.log(this.tsdocTitle) console.log("Title Value is:", f.value.docTitle) console.log("Description Value is:", f.value.docDesc) console.log("Url Value is:", f.value.docUrl) } }
